I don't have the ability to access the latest updates or live feeds of the jewish museum in berlin; however, i can provide you with general information regarding their upcoming special exhibitions.

the jewish museum berlin frequently hosts special exhibitions that explore various aspects of jewish history, culture, and identity. the museum's website provides the latest updates on their upcoming exhibitions, but currently, the jewish museum berlin has not listed any exhibitions on their official website for 2021. however, you can check their website occasionally to stay up to date with any new announcements or upcoming shows.
